<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now create recipes to compute the induction steps for part 1 .. UF. Part 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remains the header phi. Parts &gt; 0 are computed by adding Step to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// previous part. The header phi recipe will get 2 new operands: the step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value for a single part and the last part, used to compute the backedge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value during VPWidenIntOrFpInductionRecipe::execute. %Part.0 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPWidenIntOrFpInductionRecipe %Start, %ScalarStep, %VectorStep, %Part.3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Part.1 = %Part.0 + %VectorStep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Part.2 = %Part.1 + %VectorStep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Part.3 = %Part.2 + %VectorStep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The newly added recipes are added to ToSkip to avoid interleaving them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// again.</span></CodeLine>
